title: Delicate Diamond and Onyx Mangalsutra - A Timeless Symbol of Love
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra. Features a delicate rose gold chain interspersed with faceted onyx beads for protection and prosperity. Five diamond-studded circular pendants add a touch of elegance and sparkle. Features a sleek, minimalist design for everyday wear.
description: This Mangalsutra beautifully blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The lightweight design ensures comfortable daily wear, while the sparkling CZ diamonds provide an eye-catching touch. A meaningful gift symbolizing commitment and love, perfectly suited for the contemporary woman.
